settings.text: With 1500w ebike conversion kit, Its affordability, and versatility, You can turn the bike you love electric at a fraction of the cost of an eBike, for all your all-terrain adventures.

settings.icon_2_text: Package Size: 72*72*120 mm (Single Box), 220*220*125 mm (Set Box)

settings.heading: Details
settings.content: Embark on an electrifying adventure with our Transformers "Mystic Mech Transformations" surprise series! Inside each box of this exciting collection of Transformers Blokees Figures, you'll discover uniquely designed assembly character toys Transformers bots that you can assemble yourself. Are you ready to bring the iconic clash of these cybernetic transformers robots to life?

settings.heading: Shopping Tips
settings.content:
Complete set purchase: Each surprise figurine in the set is unique, ensuring a diverse collection without duplicates.

Single surprise purchase: Purchasing surprise figurines individually may result in receiving duplicate figures.

settings.heading: Shipping Terms
settings.content:
Orders in stock are usually shipped within the United State within 2-7 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to the email address attached to the order once the order has shipped. 

Please Note: International shipping is not currently available.

settings.heading: Product Care
settings.content:
Surprise Rules: 

1. For individuals aged 10 and above, please purchase surprise products under the supervision of a guardian. Kids under the age of 10 are not advised to make purchases. 

2. The packaging for these products contains small parts; do not swallow them, and do not allow kids under 3 years of age to use these toys. 

3. Surprise products are unique and random; once opened, they cannot be returned or exchanged.

settings.heading: Return
settings.content:
You can return your Blokees order within 30 days of receipt. Please make sure the collectibles you received are in unused condition with the tags and packaging intact. If you've opened the toy it can not be returned. Start your return by emailing us at service@blokees.com.. Upon receiving and inspecting your item, a refund will be processed within 10 business days according to the original method of payment.

Please Note:

  1. Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.
  2. Blokees only supports company products sold from authorized sellers in the US and the company websites.

settings.heading: Help Center
settings.content: To contact Blokees' customer service department, please email service@blokees.com or fill out the form on the contact page.

settings.heading: Packaging Contents
settings.content:
Each single surprise contains:

  • Transformer Figure x 1
  • Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture (depends on the Figures)
  • Display Stand x 1
  • Instruction Manual x 1
  • Collector's Card x 1

Series composition: 9 Transformers Blokees Figures (may have one secret figure).

settings.block_text: Build your favorite Transformers characters from the hit film transformers the movie, as well as others from the hit film franchise.
No glue, brushes, or cutters are required. Simply snap together the pre-cut ABS pieces.
Bring your Blokees Figures to life with a wide range of poses.
Each box contains a different action figure, so you never know who you'll get! Collect them all and play with your friends!

settings.heading: Transformers Toys: The Ultimate Battle! Now with Surprise Figurines
settings.text:
Dive into the Transformers universe with Blokees' Surprise
series! Featuring 9 iconic characters like Transformers, Optimus Prime and Megatron. Each figure boasts high-quality ABS construction, detailed paint, and multiple points of articulation for dynamic poses. Plus, hunt for the hidden 10th figure – a special edition Optimus Prime with a unique paint job! With our assembly character toys, you can assemble your own customized Transformers bots for an even more personalized experience. Roll out and collect them all to enrich your Transformers legacy! The series features 9 regular figures and 1 hidden figure. The regular figures are all classic Transformers characters, including:

settings.heading: Blokees Transformers: Building A World of Adventure
settings.context: Explore Endless Creativity with Every Block.

settings.title: CraftyMom
settings.context: Absolutely impressed with the quality of these playsets! The attention to detail is incredible, and I love that they're gender-neutral. My kids are obsessed with all the cool accessories. Definitely a win in our house!

settings.title: BusyDad
settings.context: These playsets are a breeze to use. No funky smells, and everything works like a charm. My little ones can assemble transformers bumblebee without any help, and cleanup is super easy. It's definitely designed for this new generation. A parent's dream come true!

settings.title: PlaytimeGuru
settings.context: Love how durable these sets are! They've survived countless bath times and still look brand new. They don't take up much space, and the quality is top-notch. Thumbs up from this happy parent!

settings.title: TinyHouseMom
settings.context: The size of these playsets is just perfect. Not too big, not too small, packed with features that keep my kiddos busy for hours in transformers beast wars. It's amazing how much fun they pack into such a compact space!

settings.title: GrandpaJoe
settings.context: I'm really impressed with the sturdy materials of these playsets. They hold up well during play and let the grandkids get really creative. It's great to see toys that can handle a bit of rough and tumble!

Step into the world of collective creativity with Blokees! We love seeing your unboxing and building adventures. Join the Blokees community and show off your building skills! Share your unboxing and creations using #BlokeesBuilders on social media, or post them on our photo wall. Be part of our creative family!

settings.block_title: What's special about the surprise figure in the Galaxy Version 01 Roll Out series?
settings.block_text: The mystery figure in this series is a metal-finish Optimus Prime, offering a premium, metallic texture that distinguishes it from the rest. It's a unique, high-value collectible for fans and collectors.

settings.block_title: Can Blokees Transformers blocks transform into vehicles?
settings.block_text: While our Transformers blocks are designed for dynamic building and posing, they don't transform into vehicles. They are created to provide a unique and imaginative play experience.

settings.block_title: What material are Blokees Transformers made of, and are they safe?
settings.block_text: Blokees Transformers are made from high-grade ABS plastic, rigorously tested and certified by EU CE, EU RoHS, and Swiss SGS standards. This ensures top-notch quality, safety, and environmental friendliness, from particle quality to color fidelity.

settings.block_title: Are Blokees Transformers sets compatible with other sets?
settings.block_text: Yes, all Blokees Transformers sets are designed to be compatible with each other, allowing for expanded and imaginative building experiences.

settings.block_title: What is the recommended age range for Blokees Transformers?
settings.block_text: Our Transformers series is recommended for children aged 10 and up, providing a perfect balance of fun, creativity, and developmental challenge.

settings.block_title: How does Blokees ensure the durability of its Transformers sets?
settings.block_text: We've included an easy-to-follow manual with your Blokees set. Find it in the product details section for all the tips and tricks you'll need.
